name: URLAuthenticationChallengeSender
desc: The URLAuthenticationChallengeSender protocol represents the interface that the sender of an authentication challenge must implement.

items.name: func continueWithoutCredential(for: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Attempt to continue downloading a request without providing a credential for a given challenge.

items.name: func use(URLCredential, for: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Attempt to use a given credential for a given authentication challenge.

items.name: func performDefaultHandling(for: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Causes the system-provided default behavior to be used.

items.name: func rejectProtectionSpaceAndContinue(with: URLAuthenticationChallenge)
items.desc: Rejects the currently supplied protection space.
